attributes.action: Margaret Thatcher, Baroness Thatcher to stand trial at the International Criminal Court for Crimes against Humanity
attributes.additional_details: Margaret Thatcher, Baroness Thatcher should be indited for Crimes against Humanity and stand trial at the International Criminal Court. In that Margaret Thatcher ordered the nuclear attack submarine HMS Conqueror to sink the warship ARA General Belgrano, which at the time was located 40 miles outside of the 'declared' 200 mile 'exculsion zone' around the islands, heading away from the Falklands and heading for Argentina at a leisurely 10 knots. The sinking leading to the unlawful killing of three hundred and twenty-three members of Belgrano's crew.
